info.name: 9. Cancellation Response  (see ticket AEA-495)
info.description:
Reason
Any code from Message Reason Code Prescription.

Description
The prescription-order-update message is similar to the prescription-order message and the main differences are the CommunicationRequest and Provence resources are not required.

Prescription - Cancel
The MessageHeader.reason should be cancel

MedicationRequest
The same resource used within the prescription-order message can be reused with the following amendments:

Source Data Item	FHIR Element	Additional Conformance
meta.lastUpdated	Date of cancellation
status	MUST be cancelled
statusReason.coding.code	MUST be present and use a code from DM-MedicationRequest-Status-Reason
statusReason.text	SHOULD be present. If not present statusReason.coding.display will be used.
Cancellation requestor	extension (ResponsiblePractitioner) Spine-PractitionerRole	Person and their organization requesting cancellation of the prescription item. This is MUST be present if the requestor is not the same as the author
If the resource is not re-used, then the mandatory items in DM-MedicationRequest MUST be followed in addition to the rules above.

let code = $('subject > CancellationRequest > pertinentInformation > pertinentCancellationReason > value').attr('code');
